QuestData.Title: Pry It From Their Cold, Feral Claws
QuestData.Description: The shield being lowered presents a unique opportunity for new styles.$b$bFeathers, bone and other primitive materials are suddenly fashionable again. Who would have thought they could grow tired of my masterpieces?$b$bVenture out of the city and collect necklaces from the harpies on the southern cliffs. Etching my mark into them should net me a tidy profit.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have my necklaces? They are of no use to me on the necks of those... creatures.
QuestData.RewardText: Those wretched creatures are a scourge on our beautiful lands. At least they had good taste in their accessories.$b$bOr maybe they just like shiny things.
